vsParam:
It looks good as new, [px]!
Let's bring it to Varerian.

Ahhhhhh...
Comb... Have you repaired my comb...

Wow, Varerian becomes demonic!
Here, look! We just repaired it.

Ahhhh!
It's going to break! You'll break it! Don't squeeze it so hard!

Revived—!
My beautiful hair becomes shining again!

Um. It's good for you to have your beautiful hair back.
But I really have no idea what you are saying...

You are really a big help, [px].
I thought I was doomed this time.

My father bought me this comb when I was young.
I've always treasured it.

Oh...
For Varerian, this is a comb of memory!

Yeah, exactly.
So, thank you very much, [px].
Just come to me if it breaks again.

Ha ha, OK.
I'll have to trouble you again if that happens.

You just saved my day.
I must trouble you again if anything happens.
Got it. Be careful and not break it again.

To be honest, I never thought that he'd make a fuss
over a comb. What would happen if we make him bald...
The situation will be very ugly!

Ha ha, I'm just kidding. If that really happens,
I guess no one could stop him...
